title: [Gameplay] Black Cleaver doesn't build out of brutalizer any more
body: Hey, I was playing the tutorial bots with Garen and the guide told me to build the brutalizer, and then turn it into the black cleaver.  This should be updated to reduce confusion.

replies.body: LOL, I clicked expecting you just to be complaining that brutalizer is now sad and lonely only building into {{item:3142}} . This is a legitimate concern for the tutorial though and should be looked into for the sanity of new players. If you can change the title I would suggest changing the [Gameplay] tag to a [Tutorial] one or something, may make it more likely to be looked at by a Red.

> Probably shouldn't be telling new players to rush black cleaver either

I do understand what you're saying, but especially with the update to build out of Phage, rushing BC is especially effective on Garen due to the bonus mobility. I personally feel as if there are very few situations in which you wouldn't rush it. Any ideas on when one would go for something else?

Garen main here, Rushing {{item:3068}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3142}} over cleaver right now. He makes terrible use of {{item:3044}} and the cleaver should only be grabbed if you are getting retardedly fed early on. Otherwise I keep it as a second item.

your saying no to 
20% cdr 
400 hp
40 ad
30% armor reduction fully stacked with 1 spin
on one item? really? 

you sure you play garen?
cuz sure he doesnt snowball as hard without brutalizer but surely he makes decent use of {{item:3044}} its still 20ad and 200 hp on 1 early game item

I said no to cleaver when?
I said get it as a second item, if you are doing well then get it as a first.

Where am I wrong on this? You either build tank first because you aren't winning lane that much or you go for the more expensive cleaver to further push the advantage you have from getting kills in lane. You don't build damage when you are losing lane.

Garen "can" make use of the phage but the passive for it is near useless for him, 20 AD and 200 HP vs 10 ArmorP +25AD 10% CDR   This shouldn't be hard to choose.

Or getting a {{item:3068}} allows you to win a lot of sustained fights given his high damage output without damage items, not to mention the more health it gives, healthy boost of armor, and the cheaper cost.

And again, in case you missed it, I never said not to get a cleaver just get it as a second item, by the time you pick up the cleaver mid game is in full swing and you are going to make great use of it now that champions actually have some tank items.

By all means don't do as I do but telling me I don't main Garen because I don't rush 1 damn item right away is just fucking arrogant.

Probably shouldn't be telling new players to rush black cleaver either, would be a lot better if they could put something in there about building situationally, or at least core builds for a champion.
